component.name: scrcpy
component.summary: This application provides display and control of Android devices connected on USB (or over TCP/IP).

description.p: This application provides display and control of Android devices connected on USB (or over TCP/IP). It does not require any root access. It works on GNU/Linux, Windows and macOS.

It focuses on: lightness (native, displays only the device screen) performance (30~60fps) quality (1920Ã—1080 or above) low latency (35~70ms) low startup time (~1 second to display the first image) non-intrusiveness (nothing is left installed on the device)
